channel.title: Team on NSFOpenData Project
channel.description: Recent content in Team on NSFOpenData Project

item.title: Professor Daniel A. Balasubramanian
item.description: Professor Daniel A. Balasubramanian provides expert guidance on the technological aspects of the project, leading the intern team in creating the application.

item.title: Professor Sarah Igo
item.description: Professor Sarah Igo provides expert guidance on the historical aspects of the project, such as the history of privacy in modern America.

item.title: Professor Brad Malin
item.description: Professor Brad Malin provides expert guidance on the privacy aspects of the project, such as how to define and ensure privacy.

item.title: Professor Ken Pence
item.description: Professor Ken Pence provides expert guidance on the law enforcement aspects of the project, such as building and fostering trust between communities and law enforcement.

item.title: Professor Chris Slobogin
item.description: Professor Chris Slobogin provides expert guidance on the legal aspects of the project, such as 4th amendment jurisprudence and precedents.
